name: Bitcoin Hackerspace Network (BitcoinHackNet) - Hackerspace
description: JSON schema for a verifiable credential issued to a hackerspace participating in the bitcoin hackerspace network.

schema.description: Details about the hackerspace and its network membership.

network.description: Name of network that the hackerspace listed here belongs to.

name.description: Name of the hackerspace joining the network.

website.description: Website of the hackerspace joining the network.

country.description: The country of the issuing hackerspace.

state.description: The state of the issuing hackerspace.

city.description: The city of the issuing hackerspace.
